#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	char num[][100]={
		{""},
		{"1 0 0 0 0"}, 
		{"3 0 0 0 0"}, 
		{"6 0 0 0 0"}, 
		{"7 1 0 0 0"}, 
		{"7 2 0 0 0"}, 
		{"8 3 0 0 0"},

		{"15 5 3 0 0"},

		{"20 5 5 0 0"},

		{"21 7 7 0 0"}, 
		{"22 8 8 0 0"}, 
		{"24 9 9 0 0"}, 
		{"27 10 10 0 0"}, 
		{"28 10 12 0 0"}, 
		{"28 10 14 0 0"}, 
		{"29 10 16 0 0"}, 
		{"31 10 18 0 0"}, 
		{"34 10 20 0 0"}, 
		{"35 11 22 0 0"}, 
		{"35 12 24 0 0"}, 
		{"36 13 26 0 0"}, 
		{"38 14 28 0 0"}, 
		{"41 15 30 0 0"}, 
		{"42 15 33 0 0"}, 
		{"42 15 36 0 0"}, 
		{"43 15 39 0 0"}, 
		{"45 15 42 0 0"}, 
		{"48 15 45 0 0"}, 
		{"49 16 48 0 0"}, 
		{"49 17 51 0 0"}, 
		{"50 18 54 0 0"}, 
		{"52 19 57 0 0"}, 
		{"55 20 60 0 0"}, 
		{"56 20 64 0 0"}, 
		{"56 20 65 1 0"}, 
		{"57 20 66 2 0"}, 
		{"59 20 67 3 0"}, 
		{"62 20 68 4 0"},
		{"63 21 69 5 0"}, 
		{"63 22 70 6 0"},
		{"64 23 71 7 0"}, 
		{"66 24 72 8 0"}, 
		{"69 25 73 9 0"}, 
		{"70 25 75 10 0"}, 
		{"70 25 75 11 0"}, 
		{"71 25 75 12 0"}, 
		{"73 25 75 13 0"}, 
		{"76 25 75 14 0"}, 
		{"77 26 75 15 0"}, 
		{"77 27 75 16 0"}, 
		{"78 28 75 17 0"}, 
		{"80 28 75 18 0"}, 
		{"83 29 75 19 0"}, 
		{"84 29 76 20 0"}, 
		{"84 29 77 21 0"},
		{"85 29 78 22 0"}, 
		{"87 29 79 23 0"}, 
		{"90 29 80 24 0"}, 
		{"91 30 81 25 0"}, 
		{"91 31 82 26 0"}, 
		{"92 32 83 27 0"}, 
		{"94 33 84 28 0"}, 
		{"97 34 85 29 0"}, 
		{"98 34 87 30 0"}, 
		{"98 34 89 31 0"}, 
		{"99 34 91 32 0"}, 
		{"101 34 93 33 0"}, 
		{"104 34 95 34 0"}, 
		{"105 35 97 35 0"}, 
		{"105 36 99 36 0"}, 
		{"106 37 101 37 0"}, 
		{"108 38 103 38 0"}, 
		{"111 39 105 39 0"}, 
		{"112 39 108 40 0"}, 
		{"112 39 111 41 0"}, 
		{"113 39 114 42 0"}, 
		{"115 39 117 43 0"}, 
		{"118 39 120 44 0"}, 
		{"119 40 123 45 0"}, 
		{"119 41 126 46 0"}, 
		{"120 42 129 47 0"}, 
		{"122 43 132 48 0"}, 
		{"125 44 135 49 0"},
		{"126 44 139 50 0"}, 
		{"126 44 140 50 1"}, 
		{"127 44 141 50 2"}, 
		{"129 44 142 50 3"}, 
		{"132 44 143 50 4"}, 
		{"133 45 144 50 5"}, 
		{"133 46 145 50 6"}, 
		{"134 47 146 50 7"}, 
		{"136 48 147 50 8"}, 
		{"139 49 148 50 9"}, 
		{"140 50 150 50 10"}, 
		{"140 50 150 50 11"}};
		
		int N;
		
		while(1)
		{
			scanf("%d",&N);
			
			if(N==0)
			{
				break;
			}
			
			else
			{
				printf("%s\n",num[N]);
			}
		}
		
		return 0;
}
